message: 将视频的编码处理成av1，使用cuda加速
tips: 将视频处理成av1编码，只有nvidia显卡40系以上才能使用此命令，不是n卡请删掉“使用cuda加速”
message_en: Encode the video to AV1 using CUDA acceleration
tips_en: Encode the video to AV1. Only NVIDIA 40 series and above GPUs can use this command. If not using an NVIDIA GPU, remove 'using CUDA acceleration'.

tips: 把你的视频处理成h264编码的16:9的mp4视频
message_en: Convert to H264 encoded, 16:9 aspect ratio MP4
tips_en: Process your video into an H264 encoded 16:9 MP4 video

tips: 将视频处理成av1编码，cpu解码，一般情况会很慢
tips_en: Encode the video to AV1. CPU decoding is generally slow.

tips: 在处理的时候加上这一句可以使用gpu加速处理（nvidia显卡才能用）
tips_en: Add this command to use GPU acceleration (only for NVIDIA GPUs).

tips: 把你的音频文件处理成128k的ogg格式，可以自己根据需求修改
tips_en: Process your audio file into 128k OGG format, modify as needed.

tips: 视频和音频都可以用，时间也可以手动更改，单独把时间内片段导出
tips_en: Works for both video and audio, and the time can be manually adjusted to export only the segment within the time frame.

tips: 把你的音频倒放处理
tips_en: Reverse your audio.

tips: 把你的音频播放速度x3，速度可以手动修改
tips_en: Play your audio at 3x speed. The speed can be manually adjusted.

tips: 把你的视频导出为动态gif图片
tips_en: Export your video as an animated GIF.

tips: 把你的图片处理成符合windows程序打包规范的分辨率的ico格式
tips_en: Convert your image to ICO format with a resolution that meets Windows program packaging standards.

tips: 把你的图片处理成avif格式，压缩效率极高，可以在相同图像质量的情况下大幅度降低存储占用
tips_en: Convert your image to AVIF format, which has a very high compression efficiency and can significantly reduce storage usage at the same image quality.

message: 将0:20-0:30的片段裁出来拼到开头
tips: 把中间某段视频或者音频裁剪到其他地方，能工作但是这种东西或许正儿八经剪辑软件更适合
message_en: Cut the 0:20-0:30 segment and splice it to the beginning
tips_en: Cut a segment from the middle of the video or audio and splice it to another place. It works, but proper editing software might be more suitable.

tips: 把视频的码率更改为指定的参数，可以自己修改
tips_en: Change the bitrate of the video to the specified parameter, you can modify it yourself.

tips: 把你视频的分辨率处理为720p，可以手动更改
tips_en: Convert your video resolution to 720p, it can be manually adjusted.

message: 把字幕内嵌的srt字幕提取出来
tips: 把内嵌字幕的视频提取出内部的字幕，可以手动指定提取哪条轨道
tips_en: Extract embedded subtitles from the video, you can manually specify which track to extract.

message: 将视频内的音频提取出来
tips: 把视频内部的声音单独提取出来保存为音频文件
tips_en: Extract the sound from the video and save it as an audio file.

tips: 处理音频常用的更改采样率
tips_en: A common audio processing operation to change the sample rate.

tips: 把你的视频内的声音去掉，变成没有声音的视频
tips_en: Remove the sound from your video, turning it into a silent video.

tips: 把图片或者视频处理成黑白的样子，没有颜色
tips_en: Convert your image or video to black and white, with no color.

message: 使用参数-hwaccel auto进行硬件解码
tips: 在处理的时候加上这一句可以使用gpu加速处理（通用所以比较慢）
message_en: Use parameter -hwaccel auto for hardware decoding
tips_en: Add this command to use GPU acceleration (generic, so relatively slow).

message: 使用h264_qsv解码器进行硬件加速
tips: 在处理的时候加上这一句可以使用gpu加速处理（只有intel显卡可以用）
message_en: Use h264_qsv decoder for hardware acceleration
tips_en: Add this command to use GPU acceleration (only for Intel GPUs).

message: 使用h264_cuvid和h264_nvenc进行硬件加速，-c:v h264_cuvid 必须放在输入文件前面
tips: 在处理的时候加上这一句可以使用gpu加速处理（只有nvidia显卡可以用）
message_en: Use h264_cuvid and h264_nvenc for hardware acceleration, -c:v h264_cuvid must be placed before the input file
tips_en: Add this command to use GPU acceleration (only for NVIDIA GPUs).

message: 使用h264_amf或者h264_mf进行硬件加速
tips: 在处理的时候加上这一句可以使用gpu加速处理（只有amd显卡可以用）
message_en: Use h264_amf or h264_mf for hardware acceleration
tips_en: Add this command to use GPU acceleration (only for AMD GPUs).

tips: 在处理的时候加上这一句可以使用gpu加速处理（只有苹果电脑可以用）
tips_en: Add this command to use GPU acceleration (only for Apple computers).

tips: 把图片或者视频处理成颜色相反的样子
tips_en: Convert your image or video to have inverted colors.

message: 让视频和音频的播放速度都降低为原来的0.5倍
tips: 可以让视频/音频的播放速度变为0.5（慢速播放）。
message_en: Reduce playback speed of video and audio to 0.5x
tips_en: Reduce the playback speed of video/audio to 0.5x (slow motion).

message: 把我发的路径里的图像添加到音频里用做海报图像
tips: 用所选择的图片作为音频文件的封面，使用这个请仅选择一张图片和一个音频文件,正常情况会得到一个海报封面的视频文件
message_en: Add an image to the audio as a poster image
tips_en: Use the selected image as the cover for the audio file. Use only one image and one audio file for this command. Usually, this will result in a poster image video file.

message: 把我发的路径里的几个视频按照顺序拼接成一个视频
tips: 用所选择的多个视频拼接成一个新的长视频
message_en: Concatenate multiple videos in the specified order
tips_en: Concatenate multiple selected videos into one long video.

message: 把我发的路径里的几个音频按照顺序拼接成一个音频
tips: 用所选择的多个音频拼接成一个新的长音频
message_en: Concatenate multiple audios in the specified order
tips_en: Concatenate multiple selected audio files into one long audio file.

tips: 把你的视频上下颠倒
tips_en: Flip your video upside down.

tips: 把你的视频左右颠倒
tips_en: Flip your video left to right.

message: 把视频连带着音频一起倒放
tips: 把你的视频连带着音频一起倒放播放
message_en: Reverse video and audio playback together
tips_en: Reverse both video and audio playback together.

message: 把视频连带着音频一起3倍速播放
tips: 把你的视频连带着音频一起3倍速播放
message_en: 3x speed playback for video and audio together
tips_en: Play both video and audio at 3x speed together.

message: 给视频添加一段位于垂直底部水平居中的黑色字幕和白色字幕，字幕从视频的第0:20-0:30开始出现。字幕内容都为：Hello World!，白色字幕大小为50px黑色字幕大小为51px，两个字幕的垂直坐标一致，白色字幕显示在黑色字幕的图层上面
tips: 给视频添加一段带黑色描边的字幕，可以手动更改颜色，大小和出现时间
message_en: Add black and white subtitles to the bottom center of the video, subtitles appear from 0:20-0:30. Text: 'Hello World!', white subtitle size: 50px, black subtitle size: 51px, both subtitles vertically aligned, white subtitle layer above black subtitle layer
tips_en: Add subtitles with a black border to the video. You can manually change the color, size, and appearance time.

tips: 把你的gif转换成视频（mp4）
tips_en: Convert your GIF to a video (mp4)

tips: 把你的视频转换成m3u8格式
tips_en: Convert your video to a m3u8

message: 让视频大小变为原来的一半
tips: 把你的视频文件大小变为一半大小
message_en: Reduce the size of the video by half
tips_en: Reduce the size of your video file by half

message: 让视频大小变为原来的一半
tips: 把你的视频文件大小变为一半大小
message_en: Reduce the size of the video by half
tips_en: Reduce the size of your video file by half

message: 转换成m3u8并保存在叫114514的文件夹
tips: 把你的视频文件转换成分段文件的m3u8并保存在输出文件夹下面的一个新文件夹
message_en: Reduce the size of the video by half
tips_en: Reduce the size of your video file by half
